Title: Super large towel - love it !!
Body: Great towel. Super soft and thick. Was nervous about the reviews stating that it doesn’t dry you off. So I washed it and hung it up to dry for a bit then put it in the dryer.  It didn’t break my washer when it was wet, it was a bit heavy but not an issue.  So I’ve used it 3 more times since I washed it and it’s a dream. So soft and absorbs better now. Love it. I’m buying another one right now.  The fuzzies aren’t bad now either.  LOVE IT!!!  Well worth the money.9/25/2019. Update:  the towels are still super fuzzy and I hate that. I’m covered in fuzzy lint after I dry off. Not purchasing these again.

Author: Hiacynth Bouquet
Title: Ahhh, Turkish cotton is the best!
Body: Bought these for our guest bathroom and couldn't be happier.  Having traveled to Turkey, I so appreciate their cotton.  It is the kind of soft quality cotton that you find in t-shirts and underwear at Marks and Spencer in London if you are familiar.  These towels are nice and large.  Be sure to wash and dry them first in cold water using Woolite for Darks detergent and they will maintain their color best if you are buying black.  With initial wash, a lot of fuzz will come off which is part of their manufacturing.  The seller included a nice thank you note which shows they care and offers a discount card on future purchases which I intend to use.  The black is jet black, not charcoal as others sometimes are.  Highly recommend this product and this seller!

Title: Lint balls are nice and fluffy but I wanted towels!
Body: Following the recommendations of the seller I washed these towels in warm water and then dried them.  They were soft, thin but that was OK, and lots of lint. (See photo of the drier screen).  I then washed them again, just in cold water, dried, and still tons of lint.  So I did it a third time.My expectation was the lint - fiber dust and loose fine  strands of cotton - would decrease like all my previous towels.  But no.  (See photo of 3 balls of lint).  I can already see that some of the edges are going after three washings.Returned.Update: 5/2020.  I bought some towels from a highly rated company that is not on Amazon.  Turkish cotton, much thicker, very fluffy and a bit larger.  Washed them - NO LINT - and still very fluffy after washing.  Almost exactly twice the price. Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2020
Author: LizGM
Title: Towel feelings are very subjective but here's my attempt to be objective
Body: **5 month update**I thought it worth updating my review since I'm changing my rating to 5 stars. Why? Because the towels have only gotten better. They have not faded in the slightest (still washing them in HOT), they've gotten more absorbent yet are still soft, and they don't leave ANY lint on me when I dry myself and hardly any in the dryer. These are indeed high quality towels, would 100% purchase again. Unfortunately, I don't need to - but I would!Original review:After reading many of the reviews for these towels which spanned the spectrum between love and hate, I realized that how one feels about towels is VERY subjective. After all, not everyone wants the same thing from a towel.  For example, apparently many people want fluffy, soft towels.  Personally, I hate that - I want thin absorbent towels. Furthermore, the aggressiveness of one's washing machine needs to be taken into account. One machine can shred an averagely constructed towel; another (like mine, which is very wussy) will be lucky to give it a barely decent wash.(By the way, the ONLY reason I bought these towels was because of the color. I couldn't find aquamarine towels anywhere else for less than $50, hence this purchase. Color trumped all other requirements for me.)Anyhoo, that being said, here is my review, which is based on my personal preferences:- The towels are soft and fluffy. Great for sleeping and perhaps protection from cold bathroom air; not so great for absorbency. Sure, they're OK, but I like my cheap rough towels that suck up water like a sponge.- I washed my towels in hot water in my wussy front loader machine when I got them and yes, they dyed the two white rags that I washed them with (deliberately, as a test) light blue.  Ummm... duh.- The towels shed profusely in the dryer. Not enough to overwhelm my lint collector, however, but my dryer is also a bit on the wussy side. I expected no less because, um, they're new towels. Again.... duh.- Drying off with the towels did leave a wee bit of lint on my body but not enough to get excited about. Used the hand towels before putting in my contacts and had no problems, if that helps clarify "wee bit".  I'm sure in another wash or two that'll end.- Subsequent washing (still hot water, mind you) occurred only with like colors so I didn't notice any color transfer. Shedding was significantly less. Yah.In summary: I think these are good towels. I love, love, love the color - just looking at them makes me happy.  I wish they were thinner and more absorbent, but give 'em 15-20 years and I'm sure they will be. In the meantime, it's nice to know these towels could second as emergency blankets in cold weather.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2019

Author: Dave Miner
Title: Bath mats don’t consistently math towel colours
Body: They were as described they did bleed color on first wash and had filled lint basket twice but they were soft and relatively thick and absorbed water.  I have the bath sheets, bath towel sets and two colours of guest towel sets and they were all consistent. The two lighter colours did not bleed but the dark purple ones did.  My only complaint is the bath Matt for the green towels did not match at all in color and were a distinct lighter color.  That is what I took off a star for.  The light brown towels and moss green towels and purple violet towels were all as pictured. I was hesitant to get them due to a few bad ratings but liked the purple to go ahead with replacing all our personal and guest towels.  I did wash each set separately cool water and dryer on medium low for two thirty minute increments to empty the lint bin. I used a laundry sanitizer with a little detergent. No discolouration in any of the towels or bath mats. In the picture you can see the bath mat in green does not match the towels.

Title: an after shower hug.
Body: I love a huge towel that I can throw around my shoulders and wear like an emergency responder's blanket and sit with hot chocolate and reflect on the horror that is 2020.plus, a towel with this amount of anchorage dries one off with very little effort. It's not like those hand towels they call bath towels at hotels that you have to actively rub everywhere, building up a post shower sweat. Basically, do one or two batman cape flourishes and the wind alone will air dry you. This in combination with the voice will let whatever pet that wont leave you alone in the bathroom know what's what.

Title: disappointing
Body: If you are looking for a medium to lightweight towel with a nice absorbancy, this is it. You cannot hang them next to each other so that each one has the decorated band showing, but have their outer edges hanging on the outside of the bar.  They look sloppy and cheap. THESE WASHCLOTHES ARE INCREDIBLE AT GETTING, AND STAYING, SUDSY THE ENTIRE SHOWER, IN FACT I ALWAYS HAVE EXTRA SUDS ON THESE WASHCLOTHS  AFTER COATIMG MYSELF HEAD TO TOE. THEY'RE A BIT PRICEY COMPARED TO THE AVERAGE WASHCLOTH BUT IT'S WORTH THE EXTRA COUPLE BUCKS. VERY LUXURIOUS!!!! MAKES SHOWERING EVEN THAT MUCH MORE ENJOYABLE. I GLADLY THREW OUT MY OLD, PUNY WASHCLOTHS.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2020

She loves hers too.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: The soft, luxurious washcloths I've been looking for
Body: These washcloths more than lived up to my expectations. For years I've been unable to find towels and cloths that are thick and soft. The usual suspects (Walmart, Target, etc.) stock thin, cheap linens that feel rough on sensitive skin. In contrast, these Turkish cotton cloths are of excellent quality. They hold lots of lather yet rinse very quickly and don't leave my skin feeling scraped.  I plan to buy a full set of towels and have recommended this brand to my family and friends.

Body: Alright! I have an updated review to give these towels. You gotta wash these twice when you first get them -the first time, a lint monster explodes in the dryer. The second time, you get all of the lint sorted.After that, they’re quite nice!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars

Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2020
Author: Conspicuous Consumer
Title: Happiness, Then Disappointment
Body: I waited to review this product (like I usually do - asking us to review a product we just received is not helpful to others because TIME will tell the ENTIRE story.  At first I LOVED this towel.  I loved the huge length and width, I loved the absorbency, I loved the softness.  This is a huge bath towel.  But after an estimated 3-4 washes, this morning I wrapped it around my body, sat down with it wrapped around my body, and heard a ripping sound!  WTH?  I only sat down - the towel wasn’t “tight” on my body - you’d have to be a 700 pounder for this towel to be tight when you wrap it.  It’s so big, you can probably wrap it several times around your body without it being tight.  I’m VERY disappointed with this purchase because now I have a useless towel - it’s useless because it’s too big to use as a rag, but it’s too raggedy to be used as a towel!
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Snow White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
Author: JDubya
Title: Nice 40 x 80 bath sheet in navy blue
Body: We are pleased with this Thick & Large 650 GSM Ringspun Genuine Cotton Bath Sheet. We especially love that it does not have that line of decoration/design across the width of it like most bath towels have.  It is a single bath sheet with no décor or added design - which is just what we wanted.  It's sooo hard to find a towel of any size that doesn't have that extra design across it near the edge. That design tends to bunch-up after multiple washings because it's different from the remainder of the towel and this towel doesn't have it which is great!  This towel is 40 x 60 inches, which is also hard to find size.  It washed well; it didn't seem to be effected at all by the washing - even with the dark navy blue color (no color bleeds or beading of fabric).  The price wasn't necessarily a bargain, but from the shopping I did, both on line and at multiple brick n mortar stores, I've concluded the price was reasonable relative to the quality and size.  I already recommended it and showed it to my brother and he has ordered one and I will recommend it to others as the opportunity arises. At this point, after two washings, we see no negatives about this towel.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2020
Author: Abby
Title: Super soft & absorbent
Body: Ok yes these are VERY linty! BUT here’s what I did and now they are fine. I washed them twice when I first got them with Tide and Snuggle softener. They shed a lot in the wash but after running them thru twice I’ve had no issues! They are bright in color and a great size. I loved them so much I ordered the teal.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Violet Purple

Pleased with purchase and would order again.

Definitely recommend these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
Author: JAC
Title: Almost perfect--Updated
Body: While I do like these towels, I bought them because they were allegedly hotel quality.  I disagree with that unless you stay at really cheaper hotels.  The absorbancy is good.  They shed like nobody's business.  I ordered them in Navy Blue and daily I'm sweeping up little blue pieces of fabric off the floor, off the mats, off the toilet, off the sink.  They shed everywhere even after several washings.  The other part I was not pleased with is the size of the bath towel.  It is not large by any means.  So...based on the towel being too small and me being sick and tired of cleaning up all the shedding these towels do...I cannot recommend them.  Update:  Since I received these 6/22/20 and have laundered them weekly....they are still shedding little bits of fuzz all over the bathroom and us.  DO NOT BOTHER WITH THESE UNLESS YOU LOVE TO CLEAN UP THE COUNTER, THE FLOOR, THE TOILET, YOURSELF.  Those fuzzy bits have been in my hair, on my face.  It is awful.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2021
Author: David Myers
Title: DO NOT BUY THESE TOWELS!!
Body: I bought a set of these "Hotel & Spa Quality Towels" and all I can say is that I wouldn't want to stay at the hotel or spa that felt these were fit for their guests.  I washed them once when I got home in cold water before using them, as directed, and they came out with snags and loose threads all over them.  I have written the company 5-6 times now asking for an email address to which I can send photos of the towels and, when they did respond, they told me to send them the photos through Amazon.  I wrote them back every time and said I do not see any option to send photos through Amazon, so please either tell me exactly how to do it or simply give me an address to which I can email them.  No response to these requests, despite being made several times.  I've been trying to get through to them for at least a month, with no success.  This company has horrible customer service and extremely inferior products.  Shop elsewhere!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2019

Title: Great Towel to Keep You Warm and Get You Dry

The only thing is you need to be careful to only wash towels together. Otherwise, you'll have turquoise underwear and shirts that used to be white (my color of towels). This happened after I prewashed the towels twice. But, mmmm, that deep color! I could get lost in it. The price was really reasonable! Definitely get them, just don't wash them with whites-unless they are white!

Author: Edwina J. Hairston
Title: Quality and Appearance
Body: I did receive the two boxes (washcloths and towels) designated for Anna Louise Inn, Cincinnati OH, which is a donation on behalf of Cincinnati Children's Hospital Medical Center, Women's History Month community outreach event.  I did not open the boxes but delivered them directly to Anna Louise Inn.  I thought the packages would be delivered directly to them but probably did not correctly make that designation when ordering.  Thank you for the opportunity.  I'm almost positive everything was in good shape.  I will actually ask the Shelter to let me know if everything is alright.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
Author: Fire
Title: Having high quality towels for less money.
Body: I love the way the towels feel on your body after bath or shower. I have stayed in numerous Hotels and went to there Spas at the Hotels. These towels feel just like the towels in the Spas and in Hotels. I have recommended these towels to my families and friends and they ordered them and said they are high quality towels, absorbent, very soft, and are machine washable.  The only thing that went wrong is they delivered my order to the wrong address. When I received an email from Amazon saying my package was delivered and showing the photo of where they left the order I could see that it was not my outdoor rug in front of my door. Thank god my neighbor took the package inside her house and when I arrived home my nurse left a note letting me know she had my package for me.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2020
Author: AZ Junebug
Title: Both thick and very soft
Body: I just received and washed 3 set of these towels One in darkest brown and 2 in Coral.  The brown one I washed twice to get rid of the shedding. The Coral sets required 3 wash and dries.  With this all said, these are the thickest, most beautiful, and soft towels I have purchased, and this was even not adding softening sheets to the dryer. (I do not have soft water either.)  After all of the washing cycles, there was no color change or softness. When I saw these towels on Amazon, it said they were Coral, yet they looked orange too me too. However, when they came and even after laundering, I still am happy that they are coral in color. They certainly are not Orange, which I probably would have returned.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
Author: whatnext
Title: Wowie!
Body: These are extraordinarily good! I bought the washcloths, and I'm completely satisfied with them. Good quality.Good price.New: After having bought the entire set of towels and washcloths twice now, I can honestly say that these are the best towels I have ever owned. They come out of the dryer soft and fluffy every time, even with limited use of dryer sheets, when some of my other towels are stiff. And, so far, after months of repeated washings, they've completely held up.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on April 2, 2021
Author: Doug
Title: Very impressed with this  towel.
Body: This towel is accurately described in the product description and is actually the size it claims to be.  Its ample size together with its thick tuft makes it heavier than an ordinary towel but it does an excellent job of absorbing water/drying.  This towel does not just push the water around as some others that I have purchased tend to do.  It actually absorbs the water on the first pass!  I am very pleased with my purchase.  The only question I have (as others have also stated) is that the towel did seem to lose a substantial amount of tuft after the first wash and dry cycle.  Only time will tell how long it will retain its excellent absorbent quality and luxurious feel.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in Canada on October 30, 2020
Author: S. McDonald
Title: Absolutely the most beautiful towels I have ever had...
Body: This towel is huge in all the good ways .. I am not a small woman so its nice to have a towel that I can actually wrap around my body one and a half times!!! So plush and absorbant!!! Something they don't say in the description is that the cotton meets the requirements to be considered organic .. so that was an extra plus!!! Will not hesitate to buy more should I need them ...
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
Author: Hans Geuns-Meyer
Title: NOT 100% cotton
Body: The label says “100% Genuine Cotton MADE IN TURKEY”;  we believe this to be a fraudulent claim. If there is some cotton content in these towels it must be a small fraction. They have the plushness, squeaky skin feel, and lack of absorbency of polyester fleece or acrylic. We cannot use them as towels. Our geriatric cats will certainly like them, and since they are made mostly of synthetic fibers the vomit stains and occasional diarrhea should clean out of them nicely. But since they are only useful as pet blankets these “towels” are definitely not worth the price, and the fraud is infuriating. This is not the first time we’ve received polyester from Amazon that was advertised as cotton. We will never again order any kind of textile product from Amazon.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton BATH TOWEL SET 4-Packed | Color: Snow White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2020
Author: Tim
Title: Normal Amazon business practices.
Body: What can I say? Look at the picture. This product showed up like this.  I cannot use the towel until all traces of the last customer that returned this are gone.The towel looks great. The companions that were bought with this seem to be ok. When I use the towel....in a couple weeks...I’ll leave another revue.This seems to be the norm at Amazon now. An open product that was not repackaged properly is intolerable. This is not the first time.In the times of COVID, what are you thinking Amazon?
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2021
Author: Ffamzoo
Title: Surprisingly satisfied
Body: I was immediately disappointed when the towels arrived. The box was too small and too light for two sets of towels. They were either poor quality or I only got one set. Opened the box and everything was there, so they must be poor quality. I washed them, then dried then washed then dried then used. They are light weight, but very soft. I was surprised at how absorbent they are. I won't mistake them for towels at a 5 star hotel or luxury spa, but I would mistake them for more expensive towels. Very satisfied.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
Author: Adam Lipson
Title: Fell apart after five washes
Body: I had really bad results with these towels.  They absolutely fell apart after five washings.  I had them in a guest bathroom which was rarely used.  I was pretty shocked.  The stiching along both sides became completely unravelled.  I never seen this happen to any towels....even after years of regular use.Don't buy these!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
Author: Lynn Dion
Title: Thick, soft, wonderful bath sheet!
Body: I love this towel, or bath sheet.  It is a lovely coral color, with a dense thread count.  It does not have a velour surface, it is two Terry loop sides, which I prefer. I can use it on the top of the bed after shower to lie on and dry off, or wrap it around completely like a long sarong, which is what I bought it for, since I am heavy and smaller towels are not long enough. It is heavy, and folded up it makes a great cushion to raise the height of a chair seat or work as a bench cushion.  Definitely recommended, will prob. get another one.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
Author: Crow
Title: Poor quality, thin, and misleading
Body: The quality of these is non-existent. Upon opening them, they felt like cheap motel towels and the stitching was already loose with broken threads all over. After washing them the first time, with my normal non-bleach detergent, there was orange staining all over. Do not buy; it's a waste of money. Prior reviews must be for a completely different product.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
Author: mary jane teeters-eichacker
Title: Very high quality towels/washcloths.
Body: These are incredibly thick, absorbent and soft.  The quality is excellent. They are hemmed on all four sides and have a band of a different weave along one side, so they appear as if they are cut from towel yardage. I bought the navy blue, and as the maker stated, it's important to wash these first, separately, before use.  A lot of dye washes out but the color is still intense.  They are so thick it is hard to wring them out really dry if you have small hands. I've not owned them long enough to know how well the stitched hems stand up to repeated use and washing, but they appear very sturdy now.  I was impressed that the fabrics meet the standards of the Business Social Compliance Initiative and the dyes conform to the global organic textile standard.  I'd buy these again; great value for money!
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020
Author: Ivy
Title: These bleed the color die - already washed them 3
Body: I ordered the dark blue.  I liked them until I tried to rinse them out.  Alot of die came out all over my bathtub.  I used it again and the same thing.  And was not happy when I put it next to another light towel.  The blue bleed into my light towel.  I will keep trying to get the extra die out of them but I will not wash them in the laundry with other things - thus a waste of a load of laundry for 4 washcloths.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021

I plan to order another few for our other vehicles. One tip I have learned - is to use a clothes line - towels will last a lot longer.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
Author: Kate
Title: Okay, but not the best
Body: I thought these looked decent in the photos and what I got in the mail matched, so I was initially happy. Unfortunately problems started after the first wash. The manufacturer cheeped out and the material wasn't preshrunk. So after the initial wash and dry, they shrunk and now the edges curl up and it doesn't like to lay flat. It wasn't a massive issue since they are absorbent and that was important. I bought a second set so I could wash them frequently and imagine my surprise when a radically different grey color arrived. I double checked, I ordered the exact same thing both times, but first time I got charcoal and the second a significantly lighter grey. So if you're picky on things matching this brand isn't trustworthy when it comes to product consistency.I'll use these when I'm cleaning the shower and need something to absorb any over spray but I've just ordered some by mDesign. I'm hoping those are better, they're not much more expensive but the brand is consistent when it comes to quality.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
Author: Celia Nelson
Title: Well, they dry
Body: These towels are ok. They dry, they're thick, and a decent size. They aren't soft/plush like I was hoping. Another thing that was a bit off-putting: before I even got the towels the seller messaged me telling me to wash them first before judging. I was going to anyway, but it's not a fantastic sign if the seller feels the need to reach out with that type of message. Anyway, I DID wash them first. There wasn't much piling. These are decent towels and will likely last a good bit. I'm just a bit disappointed that they aren't spa quality as I'd hoped.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
Author: J & L
Title: Perfect cross between a towel and a bath mat.
Body: These mats are similar to the ones hotels use, but they come in lots of colors and they are softer and nicer than the hotel mats, though that may have something to do with the way hotels launder theirs.  These can be used alone or on top of another mat.  I have nice, thick, expensive memory foam bath mats that I wanted to protect from my grandchildren's dirty feet.  These mats do the job perfectly.  They stay in place on top of the other mats and add an extra layer of absorbency and protection.  I also use them alone sometimes and they are certainly adequate, just not as "cushy" as the memory foam.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2020
Author: Mama Bear BB
Title: OMG!
Body: These are BIG towels!  They are snuggly soft, thick, absorbent and heavy.  They are everything I need to feel securely wrapped in luxury.  These are definitely the best towels I have every owned.  I got them in purple just for fun and they did give off a good amount of lint in the wash the first couple washes.  I added 1 C of white vinegar to the wash the first time and this has helped them get so soft without fabric softener.  Just make sure you have room in your linen closet to store these - I had to do some re-arranging to make them fit and be sure your towel hooks and bars are well secured to the wall!  Did I mention these are big?
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2019
Author: R. Smith
Title: Really Mediocre
Body: Read the reviews and thought I was buying high quality plush towels. Bought the towels and bath mats in (supposedly) matching colors.  The bath mats are a different color than the towels and don't match. There is nothing plush about these. I was going to use these for a guest bathroom but will not now as I would be too embarrassed to have guests use them. I suspect they will not last long either as I washed them (as per the instructions which came along with them) and already one - NEVER used - matt is fraying at the corner.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
Author: srnoot
Title: Quality, durable and look nice
Body: I looked at local stores for these bath mats and was blown away at the price.  Come to Amazon and was able to buy two for less than the price of one.  I wasn't holding my breath for anything over the top quality wise to show up but I was pleasantly surprised.  They are heavy duty and look great and area  great price!
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2020
Author: James
Title: NO!!! Complaints
Body: Not sure what everyone else is complaining about, me I got some great fluffy towels soft and very absorbent.  There in great shape I followed the directions and washed them before I used them. Also dried them on low heat. There in great shape. They some lemon yellow towels wish the made bounce in lemon flavor lol. Best towels I have bought in a long time hell even Walmart towels never compare to these without me spending over 10.00 a towel. So NO!!! Complaints.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
Author: Jon J.
Title: Luxurious
Body: I love my towels. They are super absorbent, extra fluffy, and so, so soft. My only grievance is the first couple of times I washed them. I put them in with the rest of my laundry and they shed horribly. So badly that I had to rewash my clothes. I did dry the towels separately. The next time I washed them I thought well they've already been washed so it will be safe to wash them with my regular laundry. Nope!!! Same problem. Just a heads up. Wash and dry them twice by themselves before you put them in with your regular laundry.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2019
Author: Bryee
Title: Nice
Body: I love the color. I got the towels and mat.They are great, but the three stars are for one reason.I washed everything, and when I went to shower.... the wash cloth bled blue everywhere. It doesn't stain, but still.Update: the company contacted me about my review of the color bleeding and has fixed the problem! I would totally buy from them again! They really want your satisfaction to be met!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Excellent Towels!
Body: Bought these towels because the previous towels I bought (NOT from this seller) were thin and cheap. These towels are thick, soft, and very absorbent. As recommended in the "about this item" details, wash the towels prior to use. We actually washed and dried our towels twice before using. After doing this, the towels are just excellent. They absorb water very well. I saw a couple of reviews that stated these towels just "moved the water around", and I can only assume that they didn't wash and dry the towels prior to using them. We bought two 6-piece sets and will be buying more. These are excellent towels!!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2019
Author: Dianne Powell
Title: It is a beach towel size! Not especially soft
Body: This is a beach towel. It is very heavy, will always have to be washed alone, absorbs so much water. If you are a large person and a bath sheet does not fit, This is for you. I expected a soft, full towel. It is just a bigger bath towel...nothing special. You have to wash it before you use it., So I am sure that I cannot return it. Big disappointment.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Chocolate Brown

I wish I had stayed with that product. Much thicker and durable.I guess I'll use these to dry my car....

I bought 2 other towels at the same time, and although they are also acceptable, this towel is, by far, the best of the 3. I would by more, if I needed any!

Heat.Lots of lint but its cotton.........I expected this.Heck if I wash new cotton T shirts I get lint.Anyway Im glad This is a family business  and I wish you well.would .buy again Tell anyone who reads this to buy your towels.God bless.

Author: Tom C.

Wish the manufacturer would suggest doing this when they are new.

For years, I had used 'beach towels', until I flat wore them thin and they fell apart.  It's to early to tell how these will wear, but all indications reveal extended wear and a long life usage.

Title: Wrap up this towel!

Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Snow White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
Author: Square Disher
Title: GREAT QUALITY TOWELS!
Body: Let me say that I researched a million - well, maybe not "a million!"- but A LOT of different towel brands, their GSMs, softness, thickness, quality, whether they fell apart after 1 wash, whether color faded after time, or they spotted up in the wash like bleach had been used when none had, whether they were soft and absorbent, and whether they shrunk in the dryer.  I am super picky and fussy!  I read every review and balanced my cumulative knowledge to make a well-informed decision.  I chose these, and I am SOO HAPPY with my purchase!!  Soft, thick, fluffy, absorbent, luxurious, wash well, no shrinkage (washed each of my 2 colors separately in warm water, with very little lint in dryer trap, as well!), durable - no fraying or discolored spots when washed - worth the money!!  They are everything you are looking for in a bathroom hand towel.  Oh, and I bought the Yellow and the Navy, as picture shows.  (They actually are squashed a bit to fit on that particular closet shelf, but they stand taller and fluffier on their own!)  I searched for just the right shade of yellow, as well, to match a decor item in my bathroom.  These towels were spot on bright canary yellow - not at all "gold" or "light, pale yellow." And the Navy are a true "deep navy blue," not dark like "Black," not light like "Royal."Buy these, already!!
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton HAND TOWEL SET 6-Packed | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
Author: AftrBrnr
Title: Poor quality. Would not buy again. Cannot recommend.
Body: Short version:I've been buying, washing and using my own towels for more decades than I like to admit. That said, these are easily the shabbiest quality towels I have ever owned.  Even the cheapies I bought at discount stores when I was younger held up to simple washing much better.Details:Per usual, I washed these new towels by themselves after receiving this set. I was genuinely amazed at how much lint was left in the washer and utility tub where it drains.  After seeing this, I was actually a bit concerned about the washing machine pump and filter, but so far so good.A trip through the dryer removed an equally amazing amount of material from these new towels. If you can't tell from the picture, there were stray 'chunks' of string and lint throughout the dryer and the lint filter was easily  3/4" or more thick.  This was before the towels were even completely dry.At this point, there was no way I was going to use these towels as they were, so I ran them through another wash-dry cycle with disturbingly similar results.  The image with water in the washer is the cold rinse cycle of the *second* washing using dye-free detergent and it left nearly as much material in the tub of the washer.  The towels fared roughly as well the second time through the dryer.As others have noted, the stitching is subpar on both bath towels and one hand towel.  The others look to be okay after two washings and zero uses, so far.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020
Author: AryaDev
Title: Color Bleeding!
Body: I was so happy to find nice grey towels. Per instructions (and preference) the first thing I did was wash these towels. First off, they are nice and soft. I will give them that. That being said, they bled the color a lot in the first wash. Now I have grey towels with almost pink blotches where the grey color faded out. Extremely disappointed regarding this. Now instead of being towels that I hang proudly in our guest bath, they are being reduced to just "extra" towels which I already had quite a few. I am only keeping them as they are nice and soft, but I do not recommend them if they are to be hung in a bathroom on a rack to look nice for "staging" as they will not fit that bill once washed.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
Author: JWP
Title: Not Color Fast
Body: After being "spoiled" by Walmart brand towels for years I made the error of assuming these were at some point prewashed for color fastness, that is not the case.  I bought 3 of these towels, Navy Blue, Ocean Aqua, & Coral, the coral is now a blotched patchwork of darker dyes after the initial washing.  I put all 3 in the wash without anything else expecting the standard lint shed first wash.  I also added a little extra detergent to keep things moving, as well as an extra rinse.  When I pulled them out of the dryer the blue tones towels were fine, the Coral was grey and blotched.  It is right now going through the wash again in the faint hope it's aesthetics since I missed the signs during the wash to dryer transition.  While super large and super absorbent, apparently you better not mix colors on 2021.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
Author: Honest Reviewer
Title: Disappointing Towels
Body: I purchased these towels a couple of months ago. And this started immediately with the discoloration. I followed the directions and washed them before using them. They have been washed multiple times since they were purchased, but they continue to increasingly discolor. Bleach has never been used on them.Between buying the bath towel set and the bath sheets spent over $100 on these and within a week or two they were fading.They also continually to shed lint as you see here. Even after being washed several times they continue to do this. Now we need to buy new towels. I'm just sharing this to help some other potential buyers.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
Author: pe
Title: Towels still shedding.
Body: These towels are thick and soft, but they are still shedding. I ordered black, I've washed and dried them at least 3 times now, but they are still shedding. Dryer filter overflows. I'll continue to wash and dry them until they stop shedding.UPDATE: These towels are STILL shedding. The lint that comes out of my dryer lint filter is the size of a snowball and they've been washed and dried many many times. Today they officially become towels to dry my car which is also black, so the shedding won't be so apparent.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: Retired Olde Farte
Title: Mediocre Hotel or Spa if this is Their Quality
Body: I did not note that the bath towels were pretty small - that's on me for not reading the details.  Rather than being 80" long, they are 56" long and after the first washing, will be less than that.  The thickness of the towels is not as luxurious as I expected, given the "Hotel and Spa Quality" headlines.  These are basically smaller than usual, mediocre quality towels - not bad, but you will find better than this at any major hotel or spa!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
Author: Jan O'gORMAN
Title: Don’t buy them!
Body: I bought these big beautiful soft beach towels to match my daughter and son-in-law’s new wakeboard boat for my daughter’s birthday….. Paid good money for the three towels and then $20 each towel to have them embroidered with their last name. The first time she washed them in cold water by themselves they came back all modeled and discolored… Very very disappointing… So much so I intend to try to get a hold of the company and have them correct it for me….haven’t heard a word from them
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
Author: Lindsey
Title: These towels are fantastic
Body: I cannot understand some of these reviews, in general, on Amazon.  I see these negative comments all of the time.  These towels are perfect.  Thick, soft, great quality.  Do they shed lint?  Yes, a small amount on the first wash, which you are instructed to do prior to use (see my lint trap photo).  These towels are huge, 6 feet 8 inches long.  They weight a ton.  Get them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
Author: John N
Title: Nice towels
Body: The blue dye is still coming out of them. I have washed them three times. They are actually looking slightly faded from washing and the dye still comes off if you wring them out. I’m a bit uncomfortable drying off with the idea the dye will rub off on my skin. As of now they haven’t been used. Only washed and re-re washed. Oh and I wouldn’t call them fancy spa towels either. Their just nice towels. Nothing fancy.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
Author: MJK
Title: Grey Towel Faded With Second Wash  After 4 Washings More Towels Faded
Body: Washed the towel sets when they arrived, 1st wash no problems. On the second wash the dye came out of one of the towels, the other towels were fine. Very disappointed with this towel set. I would not recommend purchasing these towels.Update. After 4 washes, 3 of 4 towels, 2 of 4 hand towels, and 1 of two bath mats have discolored areas. The towels are thick and absorbent and other colors may be fine, but the charcoal grey towels are a total waste of money.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
Author: Jill Russo
Title: Poor Quality - Don't Buy!
Body: I have a B&B and wash the towels several times a week.  I washed these towels before using them and followed the directions given and they seemed okay.  When I washed them after the first use, they left blue fuzz on the other towels and sheets washed with them. After washing them a third time by themselves, they came out of the dryer with pulls and snags and looked like they were 10 years old. I recommend Salbakos - I bought a set of their bath towels in a different color in 2018 and they are still in great condition.  The only reason I didn't buy the Salbakos brand this time was because they weren't available in blue. Hopefully Amazon won't carry this brand anymore!
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton BATH TOWEL SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
Author: TheNonPerfectMom
Title: Sheds twice after Washed
Body: This towel is amazing because of its size, softness, pretty color, absorbency (I can towel dry 3 kids with it) but the only downfall is that after I washed it by itself and on warm water and tumble dry low... the next 2 times it is used, it sheds all over your body.  After those 2 times, it doesn’t shed any more on to your body until it is washed again 😂
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
Author: Benjamin Wright
Title: poor seams/ quality
Body: These bath sheets didn't even make it through the preliminary wash/ dry cycles (according to instructions) before the seams started to come apart. I initially thought the large amounts of fibers in my lint trap during the drying cycle was just excess fabric, but upon further inspection various seams have come completely unsewn. Usually I'm pretty reasonable when it comes to wear and tear on very inexpensive fabric items and if these weren't being sold at the outrageous price of ~$30 a piece, I probably wouldn't even be chiming in here but this feels like a robbery. This is legit the first thing I've bought from Amazon that couldn't even make it through one wash/ dry cycle and while ~$60 I might not ever get back might not seem like much in the grand scheme of things, it still feels pretty significant. I saw some other, older, reviews with these critiques but I assumed with the various percentages and types of more recent reviews it had hopefully been dealt with... evidently this is not entirely the case. I'm feeling dissatisfied on a level that's been rare for me in this marketplace.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
Author: AnnaK
Title: These towels are the WORST
Body: I hate these towels. I have washed the set 7 times now, each time they have filled up the lint catcher and yet I am still covered in black fuzz after drying off with one. I have to jump back into the shower to wash off the unbelievable amount of fuzz clinging to my body and then use an older towel to dry off. I figured that would be the case after the first 1-3 wash/dry cycles but this is getting ridiculous. Absolute waste of money.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
Author: Jaime
Title: Very nice but sadly too bulky for me
Body: I never thought a towel could possibly be too big or bulky. I'm so surprised to feel this way about this towel. It is very large, very soft, very plush, and very nice. It’s just so big and bulky it’s hard for me to use. I’m 5’8”. 150lb

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020
Author: Sean F.
Title: Buy These.
Body: I needed new bath towels on a budget that's practically non-existent. I read the reviews of everything around this price point, and decided on these. I'm convinced I made the right choice. They're very absorbent, soft and fluffy, and let's be honest, dirt cheap. Inexpensive towels can often not absorb much; that would be my biggest concern, but as I said, these absorb like champs. The color is like dark modeling clay, which is fairly neutral. I don't think you'll regret the purchase.

Title: Nice towel in a somewhat rare size IME...

No problems with dye in the wash over what's expected first-wash. Love the hemmed edges, great product -- bought another one in the same color :)

Perhaps another color would be fine, but buyer beware if it is not white.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
Author: KJ
Title: Super soft, doesn’t ABSORB WATER!!
Body: Purchased a set of 4 to replace my existing bathroom towels. Worst mistake ever, before use I machine  washed these towels with cold water using tide laundry detergent, I didn’t notice till after I took them out the dryer that they were faded. Fine I’ll just donate them.. Took a shower and reached for the towel to dry off and the towel doesn’t ABSORB WATER WTH. Better off going to Target. I will be returning these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
Author: Yorkie Jenkins
Title: 100% meh

I came to the conclusion of they’re way expensive for the quality... they’re extremely heavy yet not drying.. for the $40 each I paid I was expecting clouds and they are farther from that .. not worth the money and after washing as they recommended they’re still hard ... they feel clumpy...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
Author: Jen Michele
Title: Best towels I've ever bought.
Body: I don't know if any think like me as in not trusting 5 star reviews but; I just had to give these 5 stars. I absolutely love these towels. I originally bought the bath sheet and after using it a few times I bought two of the 6 piece sets. I was leary when ordering because so many have complained about the lint. However I haven't had any problems with lint; just the norm you would get from washing. These towels are so soft, thick and just feel luxurious. I have been very happy with them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
Author: Casan
Title: Not Sure
Body: One thing I like is a good towel. A good towel doesn't feel damp against your skin. It should feel dry. I've had towels that if hung outside to dry, instead of running it through a dryer, they feel special, absorbent, and very dry.These towels don't have that special quality. They make you wish you had a better towel.

Title: Fabulous fabulous fabulous!!!
Body: These are the best wash clothes !! Very soft and do not loose a lot of lint when you wash and dry them....even the first time ! Made very well! I will buy more of their products!

Author: Shoppers delight
Title: Great towels- see update

The future and will update if something goes wrong.Update: After using them for a few months, lint is still coming off them! Hanging in the bathroom, lint every day I have to vacuum! Bath mats I don’t use as they are small and slide when standing on them!! No backing in them to hold in place! Would not buy again!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2019
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Great towels!
Body: I love these towels! I was unable to find large bath sheets in my local hunt, so I was happy to find them on Amazon. These are really huge which is great! They absorb wonderfully. My favorite thing is that they are not that super super soft material that leaves you feeling slimy when you use them. They are good quality, and soft - but not slimy soft. I don't know what it is with towels now but I just replaced all of our towels and regardless of the price point, they were all that slick soft feel and I am not a fan - so I was extra excited about these. I'll be ordering more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
Author: Customer
Title: Very poor quality.
Body: Bath mat: very small, not much larger than the hand towels (yes, that is on me as it was listed). Very thin. Denser than the towels, but very thin. Do not recommend.Towels: these are not at all “spa quality”. The towels are thin and extremely cheaply made. When I washed them they left more than a half a pint of particles and fuzz which got into everything and took forever to clean. Not just your normal fluff but massive amounts. It left debris all over the items of clothing I washed with them- unlike any other towel we have ever have purchased or washed. A complete mess. When you hold up the towels, you can see how patchy and crappy the material is. Very poor quality, not a good price for what you get at all, would recommend against buying.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
Author: Carol DeMaio
Title: Soft and Colorful Towels
Body: These towels are extremely soft. The color is vibrant and looks great. The towels definitely need to be washed a few times before using (more than once) because they leave small bits of lint on your body if you only wash them once. After one wash, they absorb most of the water but leave you feeling a bit damp. After more washings, they should become more absorbant.I made a mistake in ordering (mis-ordered two SETS of bath mats when I only wanted two bath mats, and the company was lovely in helping me take care of this return. (I live outside of the US so a return was a bit more difficult.) Overall, the transaction has been a successful one.

Author: Tonya Maharg
Title: Fuzzy Fuzzy Fuzzy stuff everywhere
Body: I bought two of these bath sheets as a treat for myself.  They are super soft and very fluffy.  Great deep Navy blue color.  However, after several washes they are still leaving fuzz balls everywhere.  I have had to clean my washer and dryer after washing these.  My bathroom floor is covered in lint balls too.  They are everywhere and don't seem to be coming to an end.  So while they are soft and fluffy I am not enjoying the navy blue fuzz left all over my skin after each use.  I hope after a few more washes this stops happening.  Otherwise the size of the towel is huge!
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
Author: Sean
Title: Turkish cotton? Hmmm....
Body: NOT great towels! I don’t know why there are so many great reviews for these towels?! I bought them in black and it leaves black fuzzies all over your body AND this is after I washed them 6 TIMES!!!! They hold together well in wash, it’s just they leave fuzzies EVERYWHERE. My dryer lint trap, every time, has 1/2” thick black lint. I think the people giving positive reviews bought these towels in lighter colors and can not see the fuzzies. Would not buy again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
Author: Evie Drae
Title: Big, fluffy, and warm!
Body: As advertised, this towel is HUGE! My husband was sick of the "itty bitty" towels we had, so we decided to go big or go home... and we're both thrilled with these towels! My only complaint is, even after multiple washes, they still have a strong chemical dye smell and I have a feeling the color is going to fade. But that's just a feeling, and as of right now, we're enjoying them!
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Violet Purple
