Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
Author: William M.
Title: Very disappointed - Soon to be replaced
Body: I wanted so much to like this product. I bought 2 sets in black. They are thick and soft. But there are what I feel to be significant flaws that will lead to my replacing these (too late to return because I thought all the problems would be remedied by multiple washings) in the near future: (1) Fuzzies shedding everywhere. In my shower. In my sink. On my face. On my underarms. I thought this would go away after several washings, but it’s not, and I’m sick of picking them off of my body and cleaning them up. (2) The dye just keeps leeching. Again, I thought this would go away after multiple washings. But when I wet a washcloth and wring it out, I can see the black dye swirling in my sink. And I’m about to use this rag to wash my face. (3) They are not nearly as absorbent as you would think. They are so soft and thick, it makes you think they would soak up all the water. But for some inexplicable reason, they do not. No matter how much time I spend drying off, there is still have a layer of water droplets on my body. Not so bad when it’s warm, but as winter approaches, it makes me cold for awhile until I air dry. Some may feel I am expecting too much, but I had a nice set I bought from Bed Bath and Beyond that had none of these qualities. I guess I will have to brave the retail store with a mask and replace these sets I regret.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
Author: JEM
Title: Initial satisfaction has turned to disappointment
Body: 10+ years ago, while staying in a resort hotel, I was impressed by their towels and jotted down the brand from the labels.  I found the U.S. company online and ordered a couple sets.  Those towels gave good service for over 10 years and just recently finally began to fray at the seams. When these new towels first arrived from Amazon, I was satisfied with appearance, softness, and absorbency and thought I had found a good replacement. But after 4 washings, I am rather disappointed.  Like others have reported, these towels completely overwhelmed my dryer’s lint filter with no slowing down after 4 washings.  I literally try to remember to clean the filter mid cycle to avoid this.  I can feel the towels getting thinner each time.  These will not last long as general use towels.  I miss American made products...
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
Author: Buddy
Title: Relatively thin towel - not nearly luxury
Body: This is an okay towel. I was hoping for something with at least a hint of luxury. The thickness is medium to medium-thin. I know that some persons prefer a thinner towel because they seem to dry a bit quicker. However, I haven't found dry-time to be a problem with thick towels; they're always dry by the time my wife or I need them again.The decorative ribbon is on only one end of the towel. I don't recall ever owning a towel that wasn't ribbonned on both ends,I'm very tempted to return them, however the color is right for what I want, and I have no guarantee that the few other towels which come in this particular hue of dark brown will be any better. It's a difficult to find color.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2021
Author: Americus
Title: WRONG IDEA OF LUXURYy
Body: The product is DEFINITELY NOT A LUXURY ITEM.  In the first place had the wrong color, I asked forTWT DIFFERENT SHDES OF GRAY BUT I RECEIVED TWO SETS OF THE SAME COLOR:IN SECOND PLCE BOTH TOWELS WERE NOT SOFTIN THIRD PLACE THEIR THICKNESS WAS NOT THAT IS EXPECTED OF A LUXURY ITEMIN FOURT PLACE THE ABSORBING CAPACITY WAS NATURALLY MODES THEYARE VERY SLOW TO DRYAND CANNOT BE PIT IN A DRIER mY 30 YEARS OLD TOWELS WORK BETTER.i EXPECTED WHAT i USED TO GET iN THE OLD TIMES IN mAYFAIR hOUSE IN MIAMI OR  IN RTZCARLTON IN BUCKHEAD,IN RELATIVE CLOSER TIME.. mY 30 YEARS OLD TOWELS ARE STILL FARIN BETTER.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
Author: Vegasbob
Title: Good towel for the money
Body: First, I'd like to say, the company sent a nice email to make sure I was happy with the product and to offer prompt service if I was unhappy, in any way.The towels, themselves, have a decent thickness, are very soft, absorbant and held up well, in the first wash without massive colour bleed or shrinkage. the colour was true to what was shown on the website.  We had ordered a similar towel set, from another company, because they had the colour we wanted, but (for the same price) their product was a thinner towel and not as nice as these.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
Author: Pyrran
Title: These are great towels!
Body: Shopped for towels lately?  No colors, poor quality, and high prices are what you'll find.These towels are fantastic.  Followed the instructions about soaking them, washing in cold water, and drying them on low and they came out great.  Initially, a lot of fuzz in the dryer but that is to be expected.  They are soft, absorbent, and so far the seams have all held up fine.  No problems with the color either.  I may buy another set before they either quit making them or the price goes up.  I don't think you'll regret buying a set.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
Author: E. E. Campbell, III
Title: I deserved these
Body: I guess if I'm too lazy to go to a store to shop for towels, I should not expect stellar results. These towels are very thin, and not at all the lofty, luxurious items other reviewers describe. These are more like something on the wall in a non-franchised sleepy motel on a county road in a depressed, rural area. I don't expect them to last long, as they will likely not last long, or I will get off my duff and go shopping for some towels that are actually thick and nice and don't smell of formaldehyde. Oh, yes they do. So, if they are here through the new year, I'll be surprised. In sum, they are thin, light-weight, and smell bad. Word.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
Author: karma
Title: Turkish Towel, Cyan
Body: I was skeptical, but I must say, I am impressed. Love this towel. I thought I would try one and see just how snuggly, large, thick and absorbent they are. When I received mine I did not find it to be all that soft until I washed it and actually used it in the shower. It wraps around me with ample generous room as a plus-sized woman, and yes.. It is quite surprisingly soft, thick, warm and absorbent. It is very comfortable, and I plan to come back and purchase several more for the family in the near future.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
Author: Howie B
Title: nice but....
Body: Fairly plush, I will say that.  But the fibers coming off in the dryer, is was UNBELIEVABLE.  Handfulls, no exaggeration.  Got caught by the lint filter but it makes me wonder how much more got sent through the inner workings of the dryer.  Can't the fibers be removed before you sell it???  We purchased a less expensive brand at the same time, NO fiber residue in the dryer filter.  Overall very disappointing.  I would return them if i could, fibers still coming off after the second washing!!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
Author: Trixi T
Title: The blue just keeps bleeding but......
Body: These are great washcloths but be aware that you should wash many times before the blue dye stops staining things when wet. I have white towels and thought one wash would take out any remaining blue dye. When a wet blue cloth  was left on a white towel, it stained the towel a bit. I've washed them 5 times now and think they need another 4-5 until I trust that they won't bleed anymore. However, they perform great, wash up well so get em', just maybe set the dye with a vinegar soak overnight and many washings.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
Author: Tiffy Lea
Title: Just get it
Body: Best thing ever invented. Throw it in the dryer while you’re in the bathtub and get it out and wrap yourself in warmth...so good. I actually got one for my best friend as well and the next day she called me and thanked me profusely because she didn’t realize how bad she needed it. Lol it honestly makes me feel like a little girl when the towel would still swallow me up this thing is amazing and I will be ordering more!
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
Author: Nick
Title: Discolored After Initial Wash
Body: I washed the product as initially recommended and following the washing instructions. The towels went from a gray to a brown-tan in some spots. This seems to be a common issue with other buyers, even though customer service says that this doesn't usually happen. I bought gray rugs from the same seller that also discolored. Too bad because the towels were plush. Perhaps another color would be fine, but buyer beware if it is not white.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
Author: KirkinSanMarcos
Title: Never stopped shedding
Body: After 5 months of being washed twice a month they never stopped shedding A LOT. I'm still combing fibers from my hair every day after "drying off" (sort of as good as those air dryers in public restrooms get your hands "dry"). They started off plush and thick but, obviously, they've lost their thickness and absorbency quickly. I went back to my old towels today and remembered what it felt like to get dry after a shower
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
Author: Bill
Title: great wash cloth
Body: I usually just buy the store brand wash cloth and replace them when I can see through them. I decided to try an upgrade and purchased 4 of these Luxury Genuine Turkish Cotton Washcloths. I was truly rewarded for taking the chance. they are heavy, fluffy and soft. The hold a lot a water and are treat every morning when Use them to wash the sleep out of my eyes. I highly reccommend!
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
Author: L. Long
Title: Color is exactly as shown
Body: I needed a set of towels for my guest bath and I loved the ocean aqua color. The color is exactly as shown and it's a beautiful ocean aqua. The towels are thick and soft. I docked one star because when I first washed them (on cold, low dry cycle), there was aqua fuzz everywhere. So be forewarned, wash these separate or there'll be aqua fuzz over whatever else you washed them with. I've seen other reviews that say the fuzz issue doesn't go away. I guess I'll see.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
Author: KarenA
Title: Not hotel quality
Body: These towels are definitely not hotel quality. After I washed them there were pulls in both the towels and hand towels. We tried to use them but there was a lot of dye left in them so I washed then a second time. I’m washing them for a 3rd time right now. Hopefully, it will eliminate all the dye. We haven’t even had a chance to use them yet. They’re do not have the heavy luxury feel of a hotel towel.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
Author: M. Dishman
Title: “These are not the towels you are looking for.”
Body: Virtually never write reviews; however, don’t want others to be disappointed.If you are looking at this product, you are probably a fan of heavy, thick towels, caring less about price than product quality.  This is not your towel.To compare, try a Target Threshold Signature Towel - the “hotel & spa” towels are about 1/3rd the quality of the Target towel despite a similar price point.  If this was indeed the towel at a luxury hotel, you would leave your hot, marbled shower, grab it, and think, “Wow - this towel looks beautiful, but feels threadbare” - and immediately reach for another towel in *attempting* to dry off.If you are going for anything other than display purposes - colors are great - you will be displeased.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
Author: S. Anthony
Title: Not good for floor use!
Body: If you have solid floors this is not a good choice as there is no rubberized coating on the bottom.  Tile, linoleum, hard wood flooring, the first step onto this bath mat and slides like baseball player headed for home plate.  Feels like a painful injury waiting to happen.  My cat seems to like it, so now its her bed.  5 stars as a machine washable cat bed, zero stars as a bath mat.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
Author: Edward Becker
Title: Don't buy....Save your money
Body: When I opened my dryer to remove these 3 towels, lint flew all over the place,  the dryer vent was completely full. I ran just these 3 towels through the dryer again and the same thing happened. The vent was over flowing. They don't absorb water from the plates. The worse towels I have ever used.  Update, the color is still bleeding after going through the washer several times. Time to throw in the garbage. One positive thing is, they look nice.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
Author: Ellie
Title: Don't forget washing instructions!
Body: Much softer than I expected!  My only problem is, I can't just throw these in with other dark colored clothing/towels If I don't want them to shrink. You have to wash them in cooler water and air dry them or air tumble dry them which is kind of a pain. I dried these for over an hour on air dry tumble before I got annoyed and just dried them on ultra low heat setting. They turned out fine.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton HAND TOWEL SET 6-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
Author: Sandman
Title: Bathroom Towel Set
Body: I was hoping that these would be luxurious, very thick towels, especially for the price.  They are adequate, feel nice, an do the job - just not as thick as I would.  I guess I will have to go to the Bed and Bath  store so I can actually see what I am buying.  Are these nice?  Yes.  Do they do the job?  Yes.  It all depends on what you really want.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
Author: Chris Bernardo
Title: Look elsewhere for absorbent towels, don't make the mistake I did
Body: I would not recommend these towels for those seeking absorbency.  They are not like my previous Turkish Towels.  These are quite soft, but they are frustratingly poor in absorbance, they give that cold feeling when using because the water isn't absorbed into the towel, but instead wiped across my skin creating evaporative cooling.  Not a pleasant experience to use these towels.  Additionally, even after the first wash, they shed quite a bit of towel fuzz.  After the second they are fine, although still very poor absorbance.  I'd return them if I could, but I've already washed them twice.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
Author: Christine
Title: HUGE and Soft
Body: These are really nice, huge (and I mean HUGE) towels.  They're nice and soft, especially if you wash them before ever using them.  But there is a drawback to them, they take forever to dry from use to use. Basically if you dry off with them in the morning after a shower, they're still damp the next morning when you go to use them again.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
Author: Stelly
Title: Soft and absorbent
Body: Love these towels as they are soft and absorbeent .  My only discontent is that the finishing seam/design on the front is only one-sided so for decorative purposes, you can only hang the towel on one end.  The manufacturerer/designer should  consider this as many people want their towels to show off their pretty bathrooms.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
Author: Sparrowhawk
Title: Not absorbant. Inordinate amount of lint.
Body: Maybe because I'm 6'4", but these towels simply can't absorb the wetness after I dry off from a shower. The following day they are still really damp. They are very thin. I have been using them for almost a month now and still everytime I use it I become covered in lint.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
Author: Amy's Army
Title: Don't absorb. Good for the dog.
Body: The towels are soft and thick but they just don't absorb. Feels like the fibers have a waxy coat. I'v washed then about 4 times.  Many in time they will change but I wouldn't do a second purchase of these towels. I will replace them with another brand and use these for my dogs bed. (He doesn't know how to shop)
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
Author: Shirley M
Title: Not colorfast.  Terrible.
Body: These are soft but terrible and I had to throw them away.  When I first tried to use one it wrung out dark blue. I soaked them in cold water, changing the cold water at least 10 times and water still blue.  I wouldn't dare launder them with anything but solid navy or black items.  I'm almost 86 years old so I have bought lot's of washcloths over the years.  These are by far the worst and should be taken off the market.  I would like a refund, please.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
Author: D Hobbs
Title: Best Towels we have ever seen or purchased
Body: Great Value and quality towels. They deserve a 6-star rating.After washing and running through our dryer, the "lint-filter" was full, which is expected with thick soft towel on the first washing. No disappointments here. AND, as usual, Fast ship, and well packed from Amazon.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
Author: CKinMI
Title: Slip-n-trip
Body: While the product is soft and thick, it also curls up in the corners - we wash in cold water & dry on low heat until mostly dry. So, when we use the sink & stand on the rug, it slides around on the tile floor. That’s if we don’t tripon the puckered corners first. Definitely would not buy again.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2020
Author: Gretchen
Title: Ripped and frayed. Disappointing.
Body: Edit: The company reached out to me and sent me two new towels to replace the frayed ones, which I appreciate. The new ones were not frayed, but I do see spots on them where it looks like they may fray easily. I’ll have to be pretty gentle with them. The new ones are a little softer than the frayed ones I got first. I mean, I guess it’s alright, but I’m just not super impressed with them.————————————-Very disappointed. I opened these up and right out of the box, there are strings and frays all over.They are also most decidedly NOT soft. I’m returning these immediately for a refund.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
Author: Kathryn M.
Title: Not really thick
Body: These do not live up to a plush Egyptian cotton towel.  Not a good idea to buy towels without feeling the thickness.  Annoying that vendors throw around such terms.  Note that these are not the thinnest towels I have ever had. Just that neither are they THICK.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton BATH TOWEL SET 4-Packed | Color: Snow White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
Author: HWJR
Title: I love these towels!
Body: These towels hold the hot water so well. They are so soft that I went and bought a second set in a different color and got a set for my mother in her favorite color too! These are good size washcloths and worth every penny. I highly recommend them!
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
Author: Kiara
Title: Purple Water????
Body: The washcloths were very soft and neatly packed, but they had a weird bleeding to them. When I wet them and rung them out, the water turned purple from the dye. It took like maybe 8 cycles in the washer for the dye to stop bleeding completely. I was also afraid the washcloth would bleed on my clothes when I washed them, but fortunately, they never did.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
Author: Jeremy Green
Title: Highly Recommended for Quality and Size
Body: Fantastic towel.  I needed a large towel to use for the dogs when its raining outside.  Makes it so much easier to dry the dogs, since I can place half of it on the floor for theor wet paws and use the rest to dry them with.  Super soft and durable.  I ended up buying some for myself as well.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2020
Author: David Koeck
Title: Absorbency NOT!
Body: This is a total false claim of absorbency. The towels look nice and are soft but that where it stops. You can not dry yourself after a shower because towels have no and I mean no absorbancy.  This is a terrible product.  The color also does not hold after use. Starts to yellow.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2021
Author: art edelson
Title: Sheds all over
Body: washed when received as instructed. Size as advertised. After first use found blue lint all over shower. When drying outside of show blue lint over everything. After two weeks still shedding blue lint everywhere. Very cheaply made. Won't by again.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
Author: Carolyn Harvey
Title: I love it it wraps around me make me feel I got a hug.
Body: I could not be more happy with this towel. It was worth every cent the fact that my weight is 325 lb and it's still wraps around me there is no space makes me feel very good about myself despite any medical condition I may have this towel just gives me life just because it wraps around me so well absorbs the water so good and work every penny I couldn't be more happy with it.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2020
Author: Dennis A. Coyle
Title: These towels look awesome
Body: But after a couple months, they're already unraveling and look terrible. We've had them for just 2 months and they already look like they're a few years old. If you only want a huge towel for an occasional beach towel, maybe try it. For daily use? These are nothing I would recommend to a friend. Unless I didn't like the friend.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
Author: Opie
Title: Good not great
Body: These are nice towels. 600 gsm isn't very plush, however. Also the stripe on these is at one end of the towels only. The color is a little bluer than other purples. Sent back because I didn't know about the one stripe.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
Author: christine
Title: Horrible purchase, covered in lint
Body: I would highly discourage anyone from making the mistake I did in purchasing these towels. I purchased the navy blue bath towels, and despite washing them multiple times they continue to leave my body covered in lint every time I dry off from the shower. Not to mention a lot of small bowls of lint throughout the dryer. It has gotten everywhere.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton BATH TOWEL SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020
Author: J L Piller
Title: This is the type of bath mat you get in a hotel.
Body: When you open up the package it states this item is for decorative use only.  This essentially renders the product useless, if you were looking for a bath mat you can use.  Additionally, it has no grip on the back of it so it won't slide across the floor, if you decide to use it.  It is the exact same bath mats you get in hotel rooms, but slightly jazzed up with color as opposed to being the standard white.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
Author: Caramarie
Title: Color Blotchy After First Wash
Body: The dark gray towels and bathmat looked great out of the box, so I washed them before using to remove the excess lint.  After the initial washing, done according to directions, there were pinkish splotches here and there in the fabric where some of the dye had bled out.  I returned all the matching items because I wanted uniform dark gray, not dark gray with pinkish patches.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton BATH TOWEL SET 4-Packed | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
Author: Marjorie Stanko
Title: A truly luxurious product
Body: These washcloths are absorbent, holding the water and soap (I use a liquid soap) so that washing remains satisfyingly sudsy. Their softness improves with washing and their colors remain true. The shade of coral that I chose is true to the photo, a rich and warm color, very pleasing to the eye
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2020
Author: Cesarami
Title: Don't believe you'll get quality
Body: The quality has declined severely. I own a couple of towels of the same brand and those are seriously thick and simply outstanding. These, are eithe knockoffs or the brand is just going downhill. Their thickness is half, yes!!!...Half of the ones I own. Sad. Will keep it for my dogs.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
Author: Bonnie W.
Title: Super soft and beautiful, but...
Body: These are great towels in most regards. They are soft, absorbent, dry quickly and the blue is bright and beautiful.  However, the bath towel seems a bit smaller than other brands I've purchased in the past. Not that bad, but noticeable. I ended up ordering a bath sheet for my husband and problem solved. The biggest thing I've noticed is they shed quite a bit of lint, even after three washings and the washcloth bleeds blue dye. It hasn't stained the shower wall or tub but we always find drips of blue dye after someone takes a shower. I wash them completely separate from everything else, just in case.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
Author: barbtay
Title: Excellent
Body: These bath mats are lovely! They are so very soft and you can tell just by looking at them that the quality is wonderful!  I am so happy that I bought these. Perfection! I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
Author: Caramarie
Title: Color Bled After One Washing
Body: The dark gray towels and bathmat looked great out of the box, so I washed them before using to remove the excess lint.  After the initial washing according to directions, there were pinkish splotches here and there in the fabric where some of the dye had bled out.  I returned all the matching items because I wanted uniform dark gray, not dark gray with pinkish patches.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
Author: C85V9
Title: Too linty, not absorbent or soft
Body: I had to wash these towels several times before they stopped shedding blue lint all over everything. They’re not really soft, nor are they absorbent. Good price so I guess I got what I paid for. Simply not worth it.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not quite Hotel Quality
Body: For the money, this is a good deal. I just don't think this is Hotel Quality, if so maybe Motel 6. I have towels from Walmart that are softer and more absorbent than these. But those are also 15 dollars a towel. I gave them four stars just because these are good towels for the money.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
Author: Randall G.
Title: Nice soft towels, but lots of lint
Body: These towels are very nice.  They are large, soft, absorbent, and the colors are great.The only thing I would caution people about is to wash them separately from anything they don't want lint on.  I've washed them 4 times so far and the dryer lint trap is still completely full after drying.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2020
Author: Elsie85
Title: Gorgeous color
Body: Let me begin by saying I love this towel. It's absorbent and the color is vibrant and beautiful. My biggest beef is that everything I wash with this gets covered with so much lint that it looks blue. The color hasn't bled, but there is so much lint that it looks like it has.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
Author: Tricia
Title: I'm happy with these towels
Body: I'm glad I read the reviews so that I knew enough to wash the towels ahead of time. I washed them twice before using them. The absorbency is really nice and I love the size of them. I plan on ordering more.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton BATH TOWEL SET 4-Packed | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
Author: nina
Title: Too much lint
Body: I received the towels three days ago and haven’t been able to use them yet. I’ve washed them at least 15 times and lint is still coming off. In the beginning I had to clean the lint filter halfway through because of so much lint. The color is beautiful and I wish I could use them. I’ll probably have to wash them at least 10 more times considering what’s still coming off.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
Author: daniel m. mulhern
Title: Endless amount of lint!!
Body: Bought these towels.  Never again!  I literally washed and dried them literally four times  before using them and the vent catcher in the dryer is nothing more than a thick carpet of lint everytime.  It is totally ridiculous.  Do yourself a favor either order different towels from amazon or go to sams and buy your towels there....they have great towels!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
Author: Meezer Lover
Title: Great quality but bath towel is a small size!
Body: While we have been very pleased with the quality of the product, for the price I expended a truly full size bath towel.  It is about 3-4 inches smaller than the towels we have previously purchased.  Disappointed.  I would have paid  more to have a truly full sized bath towel.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
Author: Lynn O
Title: After 5 washes still too much lint. DO NOT BUY
Body: After first wash some thread from edge came apart. Also sooooo much dark blue lint all over my bathroom tub, sink, toilet and floor. After second wash lint still incredible all over. Today will b my third wash. Wondering how long it’s going to take before I don’t have to put up with the lint? Would not recommend
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2021
Author: Tory M.
Title: Great but sheds
Body: Love love love the size absorbs like no other towel I’ve ever owned before, and I can’t literally wrap it around me two and a half times! It’s thick and soft! BUUUUT even after washing and drying it STILL sheds and when I put lotion on? Such a gross feeling I have to go get a different towel to get it all off. Hopefully washing a couple of times will work.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Snow White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2021
Author: Chandra F.
Title: Meh
Body: So I washed this towel before using and wow did this thing shed.  I was surprised there was any towel left.I’ve washed it a few times and it hasn’t stopped shedding yet
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
Author: K
Title: Dye Bleeds
Body: Its recommended to wash before use. I don't have a washer or dryer in my apartment and so it turns my water purple. I only need them for damping for the night time to help with Sjogren's Syndrome dry problems. I wish I got white but ill try not to make the purple water bother me :P
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
Author: ST
Title: Not Turkish Cotton
Body: I bought quite a few of these towels off the 5-star reviews. I wish I didn't. The quality of this cotton is not the same quality I've had of turkish towels in the middle east. After washing, these towels feel like regular cotton towels. They're borderline abrasive. I do not recommend.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
Author: LM
Title: Great Purchase
Body: I really loved these towels, they are so soft and gentle on the skin.  They are easy to care for and are very absorbent.  I will definitely order another set of these towels.  My whole family loves them.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
Author: Rita Belle
Title: Not as absorbent as expected.
Body: I wanted to love these towels but unfortunately both my husband and I noticed how hard you had to work to get the water off after washing hands or a shower. They're very soft, but shed a lot when washed as instructed. I don't know if the absorbability would improve after a few washings. I'm returning these.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
Author: C. Thompson
Title: Color not true
Body: Ended up returning these. The "coral" color is not at all coral but a washed out salmon. They looked like they were good quality from what I could tell but never took them out of the packaging.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
Author: SG.
Title: Fluffy, soft but does not absorb!
Body: Nice dark navy blue color, super soft but unfortunately does not absorb water/moisture from your body. leaves it wet. Unfortunately as I washed the towels before use I cannot return but not worth the money at all.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
Author: T. Layman
Title: These Banded Bath Mats Work.
Body: These banded bath mats work well in my front loader washing machine. My old bath mats held too much water and never released enough water during the last cycle. So, I highly recommend these 900 GSM bath mats.
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020
Author: Gary
Title: Nice towels, but will the color last!!
Body: Nice soft towels.  However, I bought Navy colored and the dye seems to be coming out of the fabric.  I did a cool water rinse/light wash when I first received the towels. The color lightened. When I’ve used a wash cloth, more dye comes out when I rinse the cloth in the sink.  I wonder what color they’ll end up to be??
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
Author: AmazonDependent
Title: THICK, SOFT, Bath Sheet
Body: Very thick, soft bath sheet.  Because of the thickness of this terrycloth, it’s absorbency not as good as a thinner towel, but a trade-off I’m happy to make to wrap up in this THICK, SOFT Bath Sheet.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
Author: NoRegrets
Title: Just like a towel
Body: Very nice item 👌🏽 like in a hotel floor mate. Towel type of mate for the price it's good but not what I really wanted it's washable nice thin no bad thoughts here just need a soft one and thick size type
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
Author: Peg R.
Title: Just Nope
Body: So I received an email from the vendor recommending that the towels be washed first before using. . . so I did. Mind you this is the very first washing the towels in a brand new washing machine that has NEVER had bleach used in it.The photograph speaks for itself. I contacted the vendor via email and they apologized for the issue and offered to make it right. I responded with the information they requested and they have now gone radio silent.I can’t recommend these as I will have to take time to replace them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
Author: T.J. Sachs
Title: A Tie-Dye Mess
Body: What these towels bring in term of softness and thickness does not make up for the copious amount of dye that comes out in the wash. I pre-washed these towels several times before use and they are still bleeding as if they were never pre-washed. It's not worth having my other clothes ruined, so unless I buy white, I won't buy these in a color again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2021
Author: Khaliah
Title: was happy with 1st purchase but 2nd not happy
Body: This is my second time purchasing these towels my first time they were perfect nice and bright this second time way lighter and the color looks faded very dissapointing that they don't match my other set idk if I would purchase again due to the quality change
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
Author: Chanel CreativeMia
Title: Thick and soft!!❤️
Body: I love these towels!! They are thick, soft, and high quality!! They definitely do not feel cheap! I bought these for my mother in law because she was looking for some new towels for her bathroom. She LOVES THEM!! ❤️ When my husband and I move into our new home I plan to buy more!!
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton WASHCLOTH SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
Author: SharonT, Pittsburgh
Title: Thick, Absorbent & Pretty
Body: These towels are better than I expected.  They are thick, absorbent and the color is very vibrant! I purchased them to match the sunflower pictures hanging on my walls. The color matches the sunflowers perfectly! I'm pleased with my order and would recommend them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
Author: Jennifer
Title: Cheap towels. Do not buy!
Body: These towels looked nice when I bought them, but I was immediately disappointed as soon as I opened the package.  They are very thin and long and only have banding on one side which I thought was strange.  The worst part is they don't absorb water!  Even after washing them, they still don't absorb very well.  They are like a cheap dollar store towel.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
Author: LEBEAU75
Title: Nice thick absorbing towels.
Body: Nice towel, great size and absorption. First few washes. Make sure to wash by them selves.  The dye bleeds out everytime. I have washed these several times and the wash clothes still bleed when I wrong them out in the sink.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2021
Author: bwells
Title: Faded color
Body: These are excellent quality towels, however I’ve had them for three months and the color has faded significantly. They started out grey and now have faded to a light taupe color. Not happy about this.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I expected better
Body: It doesn’t lay flat after the first wash, I don’t want a bath mat I have to iron!  So I can’t really say I like it because the corners turn up which could cause a tripping hazard in the bathroom, they are soft and thick though
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
Author: Sarah Reimers
Title: Great for the size not the weight.
Body: These towels are huge!  If you're shopping for a large towel, shop no more. If you want a lightweight, quick drying towel, keep looking. Super heavy is nice for blankets but not in a towel that you are trying to wrap yourself up in after a shower. Takes awhile to dry too in a bathroom hanging over the shower's curtain rod.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
Author: Anna Otis
Title: Very soft
Body: Love these towels. Very soft. I wish they were a bit larger but they are just like a regular towel size. Love the green color. They match our home very well.
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton HAND TOWEL SET 6-Packed | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021
Author: Sally E. Davis
Title: Better Than Expected
Body: I love this towel set.  After washing once, they fluffed up really nicely and are soft.  I ordered yellow but they actually are gold which I love more.  I recommend these.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: DV
Title: Very disappointed
Body: I have bought the turquoise set and they was perfect. So I decided to buy the grey set and they faded with first wash, they have spots on them that looks like they was bleached but NO beach was used. Very disappointing...
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
Author: Boo
Title: Boo
Body: The towels are thin same as the washcloths little ringspun it's not heavy.hope it last a year when u wash it alit and dry it  it's soft I am skeptical about this towels I haven't used it yet I just dislike it
Style: Size: Turkish Cotton BATH TOWEL SET 4-Packed | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
Author: Roxanne
Title: Terrific bath mat
Body: Just the perfect size tub mat. Very soft towel fabric. I bought them because the colors were what I needed in my bathroom. Two in a package was a big bonus for such a great product.

Was hoping to send these to college with my daughter, but she will wash it with her clothes and they will all be ruined. Too bad because they would be nice if they were colorfast.

Author: Katie
Title: Theses towels are terrible!
Body: We had these on our wedding registry and when we received the set as a gift they looked awesome and felt great. After washing them they were starting to pill. I used one after a shower and upon wiping my body I looked down and I had cotton balls and fabric everywhere. I actually had to get back in to the shower to rinse myself off. The towels are basically disintegrating. I've had $5 Walmart towels that last longer and don't pill.  Save your money these towels are awful.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Coal Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2021
Author: eric & michele
Title: These will cover you in fine fibers that will go up your nose.
Body: We washed them first on deep water cycle, extra rinse and tumble dried them. They shed when used. Maybe they are made out of cats? Our bodies are mostly dry, but now covered in fuzz. My hair has small clumps of fuzz tangled in it. We would have been better off drying ourselves with the neighbors dog.They are nice for a nameless brand towel until you use them. These would make great decoration towels for staging a home.
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Ocean Aqua

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2021
Author: Mary
Title: FADED
Body: We got these from our wedding registry in the dark grey, and I am so annoyed/disappointed because now we have bright orange spots on the towels. No one in the house uses products with benzoyl peroxide and our detergent does not have bleach. Very annoyed to have to purchase new mats that look decent.Other than that, they fulfill their purpose. Not super fluffy or anything, but expected and wanted that, so not disappointed!
Style: Size: Two-Packed Floor BATH MAT Towel | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2020
Author: bobbi
Title: dont buy
Body: I have purchased many items from amazon in the last 5 years and have never left a review. I just had to review this product hoping that someone might not make the mistake to purchase these. These towels are the worst quality of towel I have EVER purchased. Took them out, washed all 6 with cold water on gentle cycle, and put them in the dryer on low heat. When they came out of the drier, 3 of the 6 towels were totally frayed along the outer stitching and had little loops of material sticking out everywhere. I purchased another set of towels the same day from another manufacturer for 8 dollars less per set and they were twice as good as these things. If it were not such a hassle I would send them back, but instead I will just cut them up and use them for rags in my shop, although they probably wont last long there either!!! $40 totally wasted. would have been better off flushing my money down the old commode!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Charcoal Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021

Author: K
Title: Lovely!!
Body: These towels feel really lovely. They are so soft and absorbent. The only issue I've had with these towels is when I washed them initially a lot of navy blue fluff was left in my washing machine. I have had that problem with previous towels though so I think it's fairly normal for the first few washes. The colour hasn't faded and they really do feel quite luxurious and fluffy. I'm going to purchase the extra large bath sheet that goes with this set as well since I'm so impressed with the quality. I'd recommend these for sure.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on September 9, 2021
Author: dg_cozmo
Title: Disappointing :(  not as good quality as their competitor
Body: I thought I was purchasing a different colour of a genuine Turkish towel I had previously purchased.  I looked up the company and scrolled that way.  What I didn't realize was that in my search I was taken to a "similar" towel (but different company).  Very disappointed when it arrived and it was half as plush as my first towel and the cotton loops were very loose.  There was even a marked weight difference for the same size towel.  Thank goodness for Amazon"s return policy :)
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Coral

Date: Reviewed in Canada on August 30, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Never had better towels than these!!
Body: This set of towels are THE BEST ones I've EVER had. They are turkish cotton & they truly are the softest, most absorbent towels EVER!!! There was NO excessive lint in the washer or dryer, even after washing them for the first time.I absolutely LOVE the purple colour. Purple is my favourite colour & these are beautiful!! I can't wait to get in the shower, just so I can use these wonderfully soft towels to dry off with. Having a full set is nice because the bigger ones are a really good size bath towel & the hand towels are great for drying my hair or as an extra towel to soak up excess water after the shower first. I LOVE this set of towels and would highly recommend them. They would make a great git set for kids of all ages, and students heading off to college or university. Super happy with these!!!
Style: Size: 6 Piece TURKISH COTTON TOWEL SET | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in Canada on August 13, 2021
Author: Rachel Saunders
Title: Better than I expected
Body: I received the towel quickly after I ordered it. I became concerned because I was expecting this huge towel but it looked so small in the package.  I washed and dried it and it was so big and pouffed up. I was so impressed.  It actually dries me really well and it's huge!! I definitely give it a five star but at the same time I would recommend it more for a man because it is super big and kinda heavy.
Style: Size: 1 Piece OVERSIZED BATH SHEET 40x80" | Color: Chocolate Brown
